__author__ = "Willem"
__version__ = "2019.09.26"

import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import Rhino
import System
doc = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc

separate_lines = id_list.split('\n')

for str_id in separate_lines:
    obj_id = System.Guid(str_id)
    rhobj = doc.Objects.Find(obj_id)
    rhobj.Select(True)
